job_description:
Summary

Posted: Nov 11, 2024

Weekly Hours: 40

Role Number:200578456

The Apple Cellular Software and technologies team is actively looking for an intern to learn and grow in our Software simulation team. Join us and be part of the team that powers the working productivity and efficiency of Apple software development.

Description

Our team is responsible for crafting a simulation framework to verify cellular modem software and virtual prototypes. In this role, you will use C++/Python to enhance the simulation framework to increase its capabilities. You will also have the opportunity to present to the leadership team at the end of the internship.

Minimum Qualifications

 * Excellent software development and debugging skills including design, programming (C, C++, python), and debugging.
 * Knowledge of compilers/linkers.


Preferred Qualifications

 * Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Science.

job_description:
All of us want to be Batman... but we know he wouldn't get far without Robin. If you want to start your career being the sidekick of an elite team, Your place is here!

We are expanding our teams in the space sector to undertake Earth observation projects.

We´ll get to the point; we'll tell you what's not on the web. If you want to know more about us go to GMV website




WHAT CHALLENGE WILL YOU BE TAKING ON?

In our team, you will work on projects that cover software developments for Earth observation missions, including the analysis of scientific data to cutting-edge projects, defining the next generation of technologies in the aerospace domain. You will work alongside a multidisciplinary team, including software and hardware developers, as well as scientists and specialists in spaceflight technologies and Earth observation. You will develop and design software and testing components to be deployed on a variety of systems.
Mainly, you will perform:

 * Design, develop, and deploy software components across multiple domains
 * Definition and execution of tests Elaboration of technical documentation
 * Detection and analysis of anomalies
 * Proposal of error resolution and conclusions
 * Close cooperation with a dynamic and multicultural team


WHAT DO WE NEED IN OUR TEAM?

For this position, we are looking for university students with an interest and background in software development, who have the ability to learn/improve/investigate/"try things until they work" autonomously and a good sense of responsibility for the quality of the final products.
We will also value knowledge of:

 * Experience with dev-ops tools
 * Gitlab
 * Test-driven development approach
 * C++ and cmake
 * Python
 * Linux


WHAT DO WE OFFER?

Total flexibility to be able to combine the internship with your studies. Your graduation is important!

Real possibilities to continue with us once the internship is over, making it easier for you to develop your professional career.

You will have free days to enjoy. You also deserve a break!

High financial assistance for your studies.

You will find free fruit and coffee at your disposal in our canteen, and you can join your team activities and sports competitions (leave the "with us" away)

 * ️ In our recruitment processes you will always have telephone and personal contact, face-to-face or online, with our talent acquisition team. In addition, bank transfers and bank cards will never be requested. If you are contacted through any other process, please write to our team at privacy@gmv.com

❤️We promote equal opportunities in recruitment, and we are committed to inclusion and diversity.

WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? JOIN US

#LI-Hybrid




If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact Konstantin Uhl, in charge of this vacancy.




Konstantin Uhl

job_description:
These positions are based in Munich or in Imperia, Italy.

Hypersoft offers attractive and competitive compensation package including salary, bonuses, and other benefits. You are working in a creative environment and have many opportunities to develop your potential in the course of our further growth. These jobs can open opportunities for later promotion into management positions.

Please forward your resume to careers@hypersoft.com or to:
Human Resources
Hypersoft Informationssysteme GmbH
Am Stadtpark 61
D-81243 Muenchen


Software Engineer

You will participate in design, implementation and operation of state-of-the-art software products for personal and enterprise productivity analytics. This includes server-based products for cloud services, applications for mobile devices, desktop software, and web applications.

This position requires thorough understanding of modern software engineering techniques and platforms. Knowledge of Microsoft development tools, SQL, HTML5 and JavaScript is essential, as well as in-depth knowledge of architecture and operations of web-based and cloud software.

The selected candidate will be expected to continuously learn new technologies and development tools. The candidate has to assure consistent and reliable operation of the developed products by complying with the latest practices in software engineering and by assisting operations in real-life software installations.

Interest in the latest industry trends and competitive mentality are critically important.

Bachelor or higher degree in computer science, physics, or mathematics expected. Beginners, students, and candidates with other professional background will also be considered for apprenticeship roles.

job_description:
YOUR ROLE

You will be a part of the Data Core team which is responsible for creating and constantly improving existing products and services on our data platform. Your solutions will determine how we process and organize data and build services that are resilient and future-proof. You will be a part of the team that embraces pair and ensemble programming styles and follows a software craftship approach to software development.
Currently, we are in the process of modernizing our architecture, so we can keep growing and fulfill our service-level agreement in terms of reliability, response time, and throughput. In this transition period, we are re-engineering many of our tools, which means your work will have a direct impact. We value any previous experience and opinions you bring with you.

YOUR PROFILE



 * 3+ years experience working in a similar position
 * You have a software crafting mindset
 * You bring at least 3 years experience developing in Java and Python, ideally also Kotlin
 * You bring experience in developing, maintaining, and operating applications / REST / (micro-) Services
 * Software architecture is your passion - OOP and functional concepts don't intimidate you
 * Applying TDD, regularly refactoring code and applying new knowledge is in your routine
 * You have experience with ensemble and pair programming
 * Your verbal and written language skills in English are very good (C1+)
 * You feel at home with databases and ETL, and can work closely with data analysts to support them in their daily work.
 * You are familiar with Docker and containerized infrastructure, strive for Continual Deployments.
 * You have experience with a wide range of AWS services for processing data.
 * It would be a big plus if you bring some Kafka experience



WHY US?



 * Drive the development and adoption of the modern data platform
 * Work on the core data infrastructure empowering various teams with fast and easy to consume data
 * Work with a purpose and help creating a fair used car market for everyone
 * A very pleasant atmosphere in an international team (27 nationalities) - we work together, we win together, no jerks allowed!
 * We stand for diversity and inclusion in all its dimensions, we see it as a strength for our teams
 * While having a beautiful office in the center of Munich, we offer flexible working options in a hybrid setting - join the free CARFAX Office Lunch on our Team Tuesdays!
 * Great team events like our famous annual Hike Day and Christmas Party

Our benefits will promote your…

 * Financials: Fully company-funded pension plan, life- and occupational disability insurance
 * Health: Financial support for sports and wellness activities | Free counselling at life and wellbeing challenges
 * Work-life Balance: Flexible and family-friendly working hours with additional days off for special occasions and volunteering | The possibility to work from abroad up to 2 months a year

… and many more!



HOW TO APPLY

Are you ready to disrupt the way Europeans buy and sell used cars?
If so, take a detour from the daily grind and apply today, including your CV, salary requirement and earliest possible starting date! A cover letter is not required, but we are always happy about a few words telling us why our vacancy and company is interesting for you.

A Fair Used Car Market For Everyone.

ABOUT US

CARFAX provides trusted information that helps millions of people to shop, buy, own and sell used cars with more confidence. Our flagship service is our Vehicle History Report, a curriculum vitae for used vehicles to solve the asymmetric information problem in the used car market. Our customers get access to an extensive multinational database consisting of +27 billion historical records related to over 1 billion cars in +20 countries across Europe and North America.
Today, we are a team of 100+ people in six European countries – while retaining a start-up feeling including flat hierarchies and flexible decision-making processes.

Share
Finanzen
München
Apply now
Summary
Junior, Professional
Vollzeit
Festanstellung
About this job
We are CHECK24 - the leading German comparison platform with 15 million customers and over 40 products.

You want to see how the dynamic application process is tailored to the specific bank requirements, how we generically implement banking processes or how we managed to create a highly scalable system? You want to know how many microservices are required to increase and manage your investment portfolio from your couch in 10 minutes without any paperwork? Join us on a journey in building a competitive comparison platform, the unique place where you compare everything.

We develop software evolutionarily instead of revolutionary! That is why we have several releases every day, with the goal to offer our customers the best experience at every moment. Using agile methodologies, we promote full ownership of the systems between our teams. We build our platform, we run it, we break it, and we fix it.

You can expect technologies such as Java, Spring Boot, ReactJs, PostgresDB, MongoDB, Redis, Docker, Consul, RabbitMQ, Elasticsearch, Maven, Gradle, Git, Jenkins, paired with Domain-Driven Design and microservice structures brought into production using CI/CD.

Join our team as a (Junior) Java Software Engineer (m/f/d) at CHECK24 Vergleichsportal Geldanlage GmbH and take an active role in building a highly scalable and robust investment platform. You will work in a small, international, feature-based team, where you will rely on your skills, experience, and passion for learning to grow and develop our investment platform.
Your Qualifications
Passion for software development
Openness for experimenting and discussing new solutions within the team
Proficiency in API design principles, standards, and best practices
Familiarity with relational databases such as PostgreSQL, and related tools like
JDBC, Spring Data JDBC, or similar technologies
Knowledge in build and deployment tools and processes including GIT, Maven/Gradle, Jenkins, and Docker
Enjoy working in a team with a strong goal oriented discussion culture
Strong verbal and written communication skills in English
Open mindset, desire to continuously develop yourself and learn new
technologies
Your Responsibilities
Design, implement and continue to develop innovative features for our investment platform
Collaborate with third-party service providers (banks, identification, communication) to seamlessly integrate their services into our platform
Contribute to the design and refinement of our event-driven microservice architecture
Work directly with product managers in an agile work environment
Work in collaboration with other product-focused teams to build innovative
customer experiences
Take full ownership of the systems you develop as part of small, cross-
functional teams, ensuring their success and evolution over time
Your Benefits
With more than 10 years of success in the market, we offer you the stability of an established online company
Personal development programs and various training opportunities (soft skills training, programs for high-performing employees, career paths to expert and management roles, conferences, personal training budget)
Vouchers for numerous CHECK24 products and a subsidized company pension
Extras such as drinks and fruit are a matter of course with us
Central location in Munich with excellent transport links and subsidized public
transport ticket
We celebrate successes together at numerous events
Annual development budget for conferences, trainings, certificates, etc.
Relocating to Germany? We support you with a relocation package,
accommodation for your smooth start, and paid German language courses for faster integration
Contact
Robin Feule
robin.feule@check24.de
Send us applications only through our online application form, please.
Apply now

About this job
We are CHECK24 - the leading German comparison platform with 15 million customers and over 40 products.

You want to see how the dynamic application process is tailored to the specific bank requirements, how we generically implement banking processes or how we managed to create a highly scalable system? You want to know how many microservices are required to increase and manage your investment portfolio from your couch in 10 minutes without any paperwork? Join us on a journey in building a competitive comparison platform, the unique place where you compare everything.

We develop software evolutionarily instead of revolutionary! That is why we have several releases every day, with the goal to offer our customers the best experience at every moment. Using agile methodologies, we promote full ownership of the systems between our teams. We build our platform, we run it, we break it, and we fix it.

You can expect technologies such as Java, Spring Boot, ReactJs, PostgresDB, MongoDB, Redis, Docker, Consul, RabbitMQ, Elasticsearch, Maven, Gradle, Git, Jenkins, paired with Domain-Driven Design and microservice structures brought into production using CI/CD.

job_description:
Company Description




Job Description


We are currently looking to hire a highly motivated SDE II – Backend who has the hunger to solve our complex technical and business challenges. We are building a next generation mobility ecosystem based on cloud-native micro services platform. If you want to be part of our journey and make an impact. Apply now!

YOUR ROLE AT SIXT

 * You will build consumer-facing software that “just works” in Java
 * You will be responsible for designing end-to-end distributed systems on the cloud
 * You will build libraries and tools for our microservices ecosystem
 * You will work on event-driven systems and keep yourself up to date with the latest technologies to help you create scalable and resilient software

YOUR SKILLS MATTER

 * B.Tech/B.E/ Master’s Degree in Computer Science or similar discipline
 * You have at least 4-6 years of experience working in sophisticated technology environments such as building cloud-native applications, solving scalability challenges, designing event-driven solutions - ideally in a start-up dynamic setting
 * You have development experience in Java, Spring Boot is Must
 * You have extensive experience in Linux
 * You have already designed distributed systems or you have worked on microservices architectures
 * You have good understanding of event-driven platforms, pub-sub and messaging using brokers such as Kafka, NSQ or RabbitMQ
 * Good communication skills

WHAT WE OFFER

 * Work-life balance Enjoy 30 days of vacation and up to 50% remote work, including up to 30 days per year in European countries (EU, CH & UK), as well as flexible working hours
 * Office Perks Stay active and healthy with our modern SIXT Gym, and various recreational activities, including a gaming area and the SIXT choir. Plus, enjoy our premium employee restaurant, offering more than just the standard canteen
 * Support for Community Engagement Take a day each year to volunteer with the ""Drying Little Tears"" children's aid foundation, an initiative of Regine Sixt
 * Great Employee Benefits Benefit from discounts on SIXT rent, share, ride, and SIXT+ services, car leasing offers, and special deals with partners on travel, tech, clothing, and more
 * Mobility allowance We support you with a mobility allowance of 20€ per month
 * Enhance your future Support with your retirement planning and capital-forming benefits


Additional Information



About us:
We are a leading global mobility service provider with sales of €3.07 billion and around 9,000 employees worldwide. Our mobility platform ONE combines our products SIXT rent (car rental), SIXT share (car sharing), SIXT ride (cab, driver and chauffeur services), SIXT+ (car subscription) and gives our customers access to our fleet of 222,000 vehicles, the services of 1,500 cooperation partners and around 1.5 million drivers worldwide. Together with our franchise partners, we are present in more than 110 countries at 2,098 rental stations. At SIXT, a first-class customer experience and outstanding customer service are our top priorities. We focus on true entrepreneurship and long-term stability and align our corporate strategy with foresight. Want to take off with us and revolutionize the world of mobility? Apply now!

benefitsHighlights.highlightPhrase: Standard für Unternehmensgröse zb  Mitarbeiter Angebote

employerBenefitSummary.comment:
Arbeiten bei SIXT bedeutet nicht nur, die Zukunft der Mobilität zu gestalten, sondern bietet auch persönliche Vorteile. Das bedeutet speziell für Dich:

  • 30 Tage Urlaub
  • Unterstützung bei der Altersvorsorge
  • Vermögenswirksame Leistungen
  • Mitarbeitervorteile für SIXT rent, share, ride und SIXT+
  • Rabatte bei Partnern für Reisen, Technik, Kleidung, etc.
  • Kostenlose Cybersport-Kurse
  • Zahlreiche Schulungen für Ihre individuelle Entwicklung
  • Arbeiten Sie mit Ihren Freunden und erhalten Sie 2.000€ (brutto) Freundschaftswerbung für jede Einstellung durch Ihre Empfehlung als Mitarbeiter
  • Regelmäßige Feedbackgespräche, Mitarbeiterbefragungen
  • Gesundheitsprogramm mit psychologischer Hotline durch das Fürstenberg Institut
  • DiverSIXTy-Programm, das auf eine Unternehmenskultur der Akzeptanz, Wertschätzung und des Respekts setzt, in der jeder seine Persönlichkeit entfalten kann
  • "Work hard, play hard" - unsere Partys sind legendär!

In unseren Filialen:

  • Urlaubs-, Nachtschicht- und Sonntagsarbeitszuschläge und Aufbau von bis zu 20 Minusstunden
  • Geregelte Arbeitszeiten mit Schichtplänen ca. 3-4 Wochen im Voraus, die Ihre Wünsche und Hobbys berücksichtigen
  • Onboarding mit Trainingswoche, kontinuierlicher Austausch mit eigenem Mentor, Unterstützung durch Sales Coaches, SIXT Quizz App & vieles mehr
  • Wir stellen dir deine Designer-Uniform in mehrfacher Ausführung zur Verfügung & bezuschussen deren Reinigungskosten
     

In unserem Münchner HQ:

  • Mobilitätszuschuss von 20€/Monat
  • Flexible Arbeitszeiten
  • Bis zu 50% Ihrer monatlichen Arbeitszeit mobiles Arbeiten
  • Bezuschusstes Mitarbeiterrestaurant (und ja, wir bestehen auf Restaurant, weil es für eine Kantine zu hochwertig ist)
  • Diverse Freizeitmöglichkeiten wie z.B. die Gaming Area, die SIXT-Fußballmannschaft oder der SIXT-Chor
  • Fitnessstudio im HQ

managedContent.body:
Gestalte mit uns die Zukunft der Mobilität.   Wir sind einer der global führenden Mobilitätsdienstleister mit einem Umsatz von 3,07 Milliarden Euro und rund 7.500 Mitarbeitern weltweit. Unsere Mobilitätsplattform ONE vereint unsere Produkte SIXT rent (Autovermietung), SIXT share (Carsharing), SIXT ride (Taxi-, Fahrer- und Chauffeurdienste), SIXT (Autoabonnement) und bietet unseren Kunden Zugang zu unserer Flotte von 270.000 Fahrzeugen, den Dienstleistungen von 1.500 Kooperationspartnern und rund 5 Millionen Fahrern weltweit. Gemeinsam mit unseren Franchisepartnern sind wir in mehr als 110 Ländern an über 2.000 Mietstationen präsent. Bei SIXT stehen ein erstklassiges Kundenerlebnis und ein hervorragender Kundenservice an erster Stelle. Wir setzen auf echtes Unternehmertum und langfristige Stabilität und richten unsere Unternehmensstrategie vorausschauend aus. Und verändern damit die Art und Weise, wie sich Menschen rund um den Globus bewegen.

Der Mut zum Wandel und der Wille, Dinge wirklich bewegen zu wollen, hat SIXT in über 100 Jahren zu dem gemacht, was es heute ist – eines der innovativsten, wachstumsstärksten und profitabelsten Mobilitätsunternehmen weltweit. Überall auf der Welt bieten wir unseren Kunden, die stets im Mittelpunkt unseres Handelns stehen, jeden Tag aufs Neue individuelle, flexible und grenzenlose Mobilität und schaffen damit eine echte Alternative zum eigenen Auto. SIXT – Mobilität, die bewegt.
managedContent.title: Unsere Aufgabe
videos: <iframe width="885" height="498" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xh9Ouftnuys" title="WE ARE SIXT" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share"></iframe>

managedContent.body:
WARUM SIXT DICH AUF DIE ÜBERHOLSPUR BRINGT?

Teamevents
"Work hard play hard" ist bei uns Programm - unsere Partys sind legendär.

Individuelle Weiterbildung
Du kannst unser umfassendes Schulungsangebot im SIXT College kostenlos nutzen. Hier erwarten dich Online- und Präsenztrainings zu unzähligen Themengebieten.

Mitarbeiterkonditionen
Natürlich bekommst Du die besten Tarife für unsere eigenen Produkte, wie die SIXT Mietwagen & Leasing Fahrzeuge.

Wir sind bunt
Wir fordern und fördern eine Unternehmenskultur der Akzeptanz, der Wertschätzung und des Respekts, in der sich jeder mit seiner Persönlichkeit und seinen Ideen entfalten kann. Das ist DiverSIXTy.

Flexible Arbeitszeiten
Wir bieten Dir mit unseren verschiedenen Arbeitszeitmodellen ein Maximum an Flexibilität.

Die Welt ist unser Office
Bei SIXT kannst Du überall auf der Welt arbeiten und hast Kollegen auf dem ganzen Globus verteilt.

Laut, mutig, anders
Wir trauen uns Dinge, die sich andere nicht trauen und schaffen es, so vorne zu bleiben.

Ideas first
Wir glauben, dass jeder große Ideen haben und auch umsetzen kann. Dafür geben wir jedem Mitarbeiter die passenden Tools an die Hand.

Innovationsmaschine
Wir gestalten die Zukunft der Mobilität, wie unsere Plattform ONE, indem wir ständig den Status quo hinterfragen.

Immer agil
Wir setzen Entscheidungen schnell und gezielt um. Dass wir das schaffen, liegt vor allem an unseren flachen Hierarchien.
managedContent.title: Karriere

managedContent.body:
Das operative Geschäft in unseren Filialen ist der Herzschlag von SIXT. Unsere Kollegen rund um die Welt beweisen, dass Leidenschaft, harte Arbeit und unermüdliches Engagement für unsere Kunden für uns nicht nur Worte sind, sondern der Treibstoff für unsere globale Erfolgsgeschichte als Premium-Mobilitätsanbieter. Ein Teil von SIXT zu sein, ist nicht nur ein Job, sondern eine spannende und erfüllende Reise, bei der der Spaß im Vordergrund steht! Komm zu uns und lassen Sie uns die Art und Weise, wie sich die Welt bewegt, neu definieren.

SIXT ist ein spannender Arbeitgeber für motivierte Talente aus den Bereichen Gastronomie, Einzelhandel, Automobil, Dienstleistung oder Verkauf. Wir sind auf ständigem Wachstumskurs und es gibt viele Möglichkeiten für Dich, bei uns einzusteigen. Die Arbeit in unseren Filialen bedeutet, dass Du in den direkten Kundenservice eingebunden bist und Dich täglich mit unseren operativen Kennzahlen und dem Vermietungsprozess befasst, wobei Du unsere Servicequalität stets vorantreibst.
managedContent.title: Filiale
videos: <iframe width="885" height="498" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bW3ALCFGvgg?si=_IrQ6bH7tXBS6ZJY" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share"></iframe>

managedContent.body:
Wir sind ein Team von Macherinnen und Machern, das ständig nach erstklassigen Lösungen strebt. Wenn etwas nicht klappt, versuchen wir es noch einmal. 

Wir kaufen dabei nicht, wir machen vor allem alles selbst: Alle Kernsysteme, ob im Bereich Carsharing, Autovermietung, Ridehailing und vieles mehr, werden von SIXT selbst entwickelt und betrieben. Unsere technische Bandbreite reicht vom Cloud- und Vor-Ort-Betrieb bis hin zur agilen Softwareentwicklung. Wir setzen auf modernste Frameworks und Architekturen und streben einen langfristigen technischen Ansatz an.
managedContent.title: Tech
videos: <iframe width="885" height="498" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9UacOCZI_h0?si=jNiPOEA85uPepgls" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share"></iframe>

managedContent.body:
Du suchst nach Deinem Hochschulabschluss den idealen Einstieg ins Berufsleben? Hast eine Weiterbildung zum Fachwirt / Betriebswirt absolviert oder bereits Berufserfahrung mit ersten Berührungspunkten in Führung von Mitarbeitern gesammelt und möchtest den nächsten Schritt zur Führungskraft beschreiten? Dann bewirb Dich jetzt als Trainee für unsere Filialen.

In unserem 12-monatigen Traineeship lernst Du unser Unternehmen kennen und baust gleichzeitig Deine Führungskompetenzen aus. Schritt für Schritt erlernst Du die Kunst, Mitarbeiter zu führen. Du zeigst bei der Fuhrparkplanung sowie der betriebswirtschaftlichen Steuerung der Filiale, welche analytischen Fähigkeiten in Dir stecken. Du bearbeitest während Deines Traineeships eigenständig ein spannendes Projekt, bei dem Du SIXT aus einem weiteren Blickwinkel kennenlernst.
managedContent.title: Management Traineeship

job_title: Software Application Engineer - Tool Development (all gender)
job_description:
With over 20 years of industry experience, ALTEN Consulting Services GmbH offers its renowned customers from industry and business highly specialized engineering and IT services for the joint implementation of cross-industry and cross-technology solutions.

Competence, commitment and passion unite all our employees at ALTEN Consulting Services GmbH. The focus is always on working togehter as partner, a strong sense of technology, personal contact with our customers and the creativity of each individual. Become part of our succes story.



Software Application Engineer - Tool Development (all gender)

Standort: 80639 München
Referenznummer: #503013



Make it happen

YOU...

 * are responsible for the contribution within the development of SW Tools used by the engineering department and for the contribution within frontend development for web based application (e.g. proAlpha / DOORs Next)
 * are responsible for the autonomous working according to project specific processes
 * support updates of existing tools to new project needs
 * provide software coding and debugging in different programming languages
 * analyse the reported tool issues and definition of required corrections
 * provide configuration control / change management of all items produced using applicable CM tools (e.g. Synergy, Dimensions) according to applicable Configuration Management Plan
 * support documentation of SW Tool (e.g. Tool Operational requirements)
 * support the SW Tool Qualification according to DO-330



A home where people learn and thrive

 * Permanent Employment
 * Attractive Salary
 * Mobile working in consultation
 * Individual Trainings



Be our forward thinker

YOU...

 * are a graduate engineer (software engineering / computer science) with in-depth professional experience
 * are experienced with the software tool development
 * have experience with the rriting of Tool Operational requirements
 * have experience in working with REST API, extensible Markup Language (XML), JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) and programming in C, Java, Python and JavaScript
 * have fluent German skills and good English skills



You can find further information at: www.alten-consulting.de




We value diversity and therefore welcome all applications - regardless of gender, nationality, ethnic and social origin, religion/belief, disability, age, sexual orientation and identity.




Severely disabled persons will be given preferential consideration if equally qualified.




Apply now using our online application form.



ALTEN Consulting Services

Elsenheimer Straße 55
80687 München

With over 20 years of industry experience, ALTEN Consulting Services GmbH offers its renowned customers from industry and business highly specialized engineering and IT services for the joint implementation of cross-industry and cross-technology solutions.

Competence, commitment and passion unite all our employees at ALTEN Consulting Services GmbH. The focus is always on working togehter as partner, a strong sense of technology, personal contact with our customers and the creativity of each individual. Become part of our succes story.

Software Application Engineer - Tool Development (all gender)

Standort: 80639 München
Referenznummer: #503013

Make it happen

YOU...

  • are responsible for the contribution within the development of SW Tools used by the engineering department and for the contribution within frontend development for web based application (e.g. proAlpha / DOORs Next)
  • are responsible for the autonomous working according to project specific processes
  • support updates of existing tools to new project needs
  • provide software coding and debugging in different programming languages
  • analyse the reported tool issues and definition of required corrections
  • provide configuration control / change management of all items produced using applicable CM tools (e.g. Synergy, Dimensions) according to applicable Configuration Management Plan
  • support documentation of SW Tool (e.g. Tool Operational requirements)
  • support the SW Tool Qualification according to DO-330

A home where people learn and thrive

  • Permanent Employment
  • Attractive Salary
  • Mobile working in consultation
  • Individual Trainings

Be our forward thinker

YOU...

  • are a graduate engineer (software engineering / computer science) with in-depth professional experience
  • are experienced with the software tool development
  • have experience with the rriting of Tool Operational requirements
  • have experience in working with REST API, extensible Markup Language (XML), JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) and programming in C, Java, Python and JavaScript
  • have fluent German skills and good English skills

You can find further information at: www.alten-consulting.de


We value diversity and therefore welcome all applications - regardless of gender, nationality, ethnic and social origin, religion/belief, disability, age, sexual orientation and identity.


Severely disabled persons will be given preferential consideration if equally qualified.


Apply now using our online application form.

job_title: Looking for Android, iOS and Web Engineer
job_description:
HIGGS is a fast growing Munich and New York based startup building the next generation of mobile live video. Our mission is to entertain Millennials – we enable brands to produce game shows that Millennials love. The way TV is produced has not adapted to the way young people consume TV nowadays – we see an opportunity for technology, games and creativity to revolutionize the industry.

At HIGGS you have the possibility to shape a fast growing startup with your passion and skills. Together with some of the best known Silicon Valley and German investors we are revolutionizing the video market.


ANDROID, IOS AND WEB ENGINEER POSITION

We are looking for a skilled Android, iOS or Web developer who will join our team of talented engineers to design and help us to build the next generation of mobile live video.

You should be able to write clean code and ensure your applications run properly. We also expect you to be passionate about pushing mobile technologies to the limits and perform well working in a dynamic environment.


ANDROID, IOS AND WEB ENGINEER RESPONSIBILITIES ARE:



 * Create and maintain advanced applications for the iOS / Android / Web platform
 * Work together with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
 * Cover your code with unit and UI tests to ensure robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
 * Troubleshoot issues and bugs and improve application performance.
 * Explore, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.


IOS / ANDROID / WEB ENGINEER REQUIREMENTS ARE:



 * 2+ years' experience of working on a iOS / Android / Web Developer position
 * Significant experience in software development, including work with third-party libraries and APIs
 * Excellent knowledge of Swift / Java and Cocoa Touch
 * Good knowledge of the general mobile / web landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
 * Good understanding of the full mobile / web development life cycle
 * BS or MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or other related area


WHY HIGGS

 * fast growing investor backed startup
 * dynamic and fun working environment
 * high responsibilities


WHEN AND WHERE

 * Starting: now
 * 10-20 hours a week or full time
 * Home office possible

job_description:
As a Software Engineer (m/f/d) – Global Illumination Rendering you will join the development and maintenance of the 3DS global illumination rendering engine „Stellar Physically Correct“ for interactive and offline rendering in a Scrum team.


RESPONSIBILITIES

 * Evaluation, selection, implementation and maintenance of algorithms to implement desired improvements
 * Implementation and maintenance of tests to validate implemented improvements
 * Debugging and profiling of new and existing code on (multi-) CPU and (multi-) GPU machines
 * Regularly exchange with your global illumination expert colleagues on newest trends and best practices for implementing global illumination renderers in communities of practice
 * Influence the future of Stellar Physically Correct by devising further improvements
 * Mentoring during onboarding phase; close, trustful, continuous exchange with team mates on a daily basis in a pleasant working atmosphere


QUALIFICATIONS

 * Proficiency in Software Engineering via modern C++ for code development and Python for test development
 * Expert knowledge in Computer Graphics and especially global illumination rendering, ideally including applications of Machine Learning techniques, and a solid background in maths
 * Proficiency in GPU programming via CUDA or preferably Vulkan, including knowledge about GPU and CPU debugging and profiling tools
 * Team work skills


WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU

 * Huge industry footprint with significant impact on Dassault Systèmes software portfolio
 * Use of modern algorithms like real-time raytracing and advanced physically based rendering techniques
 * Opportunity to learn new techniques and optimize existing algorithms
 * Work with diverse hardware platforms & collaborate with distributed teams from various locations worldwide
 * Focus on problem-solving and enhancing the product

Interested? Click on "Apply" to access the 3DS job portal and to upload your application documents.


DIVERSITY STATEMENT

As a game-changer in sustainable technology and innovation, Dassault Systèmes is striving to build more inclusive and diverse teams across the globe. We believe that our people are our number one asset and we want all employees to feel empowered to bring their whole selves to work every day. It is our goal that our people feel a sense of pride and a passion for belonging. As a company leading change, it’s our responsibility to foster opportunities for all people to participate in a harmonized Workforce of the Future.

Wo auch immer du bist, was auch immer du machst, Dassault Systèmes begleitet dich

Life Sciences und Gesundheit, Städte und Infrastruktur, Fertigungsindustrie: Dassault Systèmes ist immer an deiner Seite.

Wir sind davon überzeugt, dass der Fortschritt die Essenz des Menschen ist, und begleiten Unternehmen und Menschen auf der ganzen Wir helfen Ihnen, die nachhaltigen Innovationen von heute und morgen zu schaffen un die großen Herausforderungen zu meistern, denen sich Patienten, Bürger und Verbraucher gegenübersehen.

Werde Teil eines weltweit führenden Unternehmens, um eine Welt zu schaffen, in der Produkte, Natur und Leben in völliger Harmonie zusammenleben!

managedContent.body:
We Imagine New Horizons

Dassault Systèmes ist eine Gemeinschaft von mehr als 23.400 begeisterten Menschen auf der ganzen Welt, die durch ihre Vielfalt und eine gemeinsame Denkweise und Werte vereint sind. Wir lieben es, neue Wege zu gehen, weil wir davon überzeugt sind, dass wir dank unserer Gemeinschaft echte Veränderungen bewirken können.

Möchtest du zu den Vorreitern im Bereich der nachhaltigen Technologie und Innovation gehören? Bist du leidenschaftlich und am kontinuierlichen Lernen interessiert? Strebst du nach einem Umfeld, in dem du dich voll und ganz einbringen kannst? Bist du auch eine Person, die von einem höheren Ziel angetrieben wird?

Dann nimm noch heute die Herausforderungen an! Besuchen Sie unsere offenen Stellen Hier.

managedContent.body:
Wir stellen den Status quo in Frage.

Wir tragen kontinuierlich dazu bei, eine gesündere Zukunft für unseren Planeten zu gestalten. Wir bieten fortschrittliche Technologien an, die Menschen auf der ganzen Welt dabei helfen, Innovationen nachhaltig zu konzipieren, zu testen und zu industrialisieren Wir arbeiten, mit Experten zusammen, um die Art und Weise zu revolutionieren, wie Menschen arbeiten, produzieren und Innovationen schaffen, um den CO2-Fußabdruck zu reduzieren. Selbstverständlich beteiligen wir uns auch am JOBRAD-Programm.
managedContent.title: UNSERE VERPFLICHTUNGEN
videos: <iframe width="853" height="480" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vGiKXRTPtWA" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share"></iframe>

managedContent.body:
Wir bringen unsere Gemeinschaft zusammen

Als Wegbereiter für nachhaltige Technologien und Innovationen strebt Dassault Systèmes danach, integrativere und vielfältigere Teams auf der ganzen Welt aufzubauen.

Mit dem globalen Programm 3DS WIN (Women INitiative) verpflichten wir uns, die Geschlechtervielfalt in unserem Unternehmen zu fördern, indem wir Mädchen und Frauen ermutigen, eine wissenschaftliche Laufbahn einzuschlagen und sie in ihrer beruflichen Entwicklung unterstützen.

Unsere Verpflichtung: unsere Teams auf ihrem Weg zu Ausbildung und Wachstum zu begleiten.

Die 3DEXPERIENCE University wurde gegründet, um allen Mitarbeitern von Dassault Systèmes den Zugang zu einem breiten Spektrum an Schulungen zu ermöglichen, um unser Wissen und Können in Bereichen, die mit unseren Lösungen und unserer beruflichen Expertise zusammenhängen, kontinuierlich zu verbessern.

Wir fördern Ihre Leidenschaft für das Lernen.

Unsere Stärke liegt darin, Wissen und Know-how zu teilen und während unserer gesamten beruflichen Karriere weiter zu lernen.

Wir bieten verschiedene Programme zur beruflichen Weiterentwicklung unserer Mitarbeiter. Unser Programm "Rise Up" hilft unseren Mitarbeitern, ihre Führungsqualitäten zu verbessern und funktionsübergreifende Aufgaben zu übernehmen. Darüber hinaus bieten wir regelmäßige "Lunch & Learn"-Talks an, in denen spannende Neuigkeiten präsentiert werden. Jeder Mitarbeiter hat außerdem Zugang zu LinkedIn Learning, um kontinuierlich dazuzulernen.
managedContent.title: UNSERE BERUFLICHEN WERDEGANGE
videos: <iframe width="853" height="480" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/E9YpmASLOEE" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share"></iframe>

managedContent.body:
Träumst du von einem Praktikum oder einer Ausbildung, die Innovation, Herausforderungen und spannende Aufgaben vereint?

Bei Dassault Systèmes hast du die Chance, genau das zu erleben! Über 160 Werkstudenten und Praktikanten haben im letzten Jahr in verschiedenen Teams mitgewirkt und dazu beigetragen, unsere Vision einer nachhaltigen Zukunft zu verwirklichen.

Werde Teil einer lebendigen Gemeinschaft!

Als Praktikant oder Werkstudent bist du bei uns nicht allein: Du wirst Teil eines Netzwerks aus jungen Talenten und profitierst von einem vielfältigen Angebot an Lernmöglichkeiten. Freue dich auf wöchentliche Mittagessen, Afterwork-Events, fachspezifische Konferenzen, ein Mentorenprogramm, spannende Wochenendausflüge ins Ausland und vieles mehr!

Ein Sprungbrett für deine Zukunft!

Wir legen großen Wert darauf, unsere Nachwuchstalente auf ihrem Weg in die Arbeitswelt zu unterstützen und sie zur „Workforce of the Future“ auszubilden. Wir helfen dir, den richtigen Karriereweg zu finden.

job_description:
THE MISSION

We are looking for talented Software Engineers with demonstrated real-world experience to help us conceptualize, implement and operationalize mission-critical software components at the heart of our satellite constellation. As a key member of our team, you'll play an essential role in the ongoing operation and enhancement of our space-based sensor network - directly contributing to refine our ability to monitor and respond to wildfires, helping to safeguard communities, preserve wildlife, and protect ecosystems worldwide.

WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING

For our cross-functional software development teams, we're looking for someone who’s proactive, with a strong ability to understand the bigger picture while also diving deep into technical details & implementations.

 * Modeling & Architecture: Proficient in complex systems architecture and skilled in breaking down given problems into manageable parts. Demonstrate discernment in making engineering trade-offs and systematically resolving requirements.

 * Development & Operations: Develop production-quality code in Python or GoLang, deploying to Linux-based infrastructure. You'll have hands-on involvement with databases, APIs, and networking.

 * Code Management & CI: Establish and participate in code reviews, and adhere to established Git workflows to ensure high-quality software development. Establish and maintain automated end-to-end testing frameworks for your software components, and be responsible for CI pipelines ensuring software robustness and reliability.

RELEVANT SKILLS

 * Shown practical experience
 * Knowledge and application of modeling approach
 * Advanced programming skills (Python, Golang or ES6) and Git, Docker, Databases, Linux, Software Packaging
 * University degree in Computer Science, STEM/MINT, or equivalent
 * Strong problem solving capabilities
 * Familiarity with general software engineering principles and agile software development (think: “develop a concept, pitch it to your peers, implement a prototype, accompany the implementation, deploy to production, evaluate results, repeat”)
 * Fluent in English

OUR BENEFITS

 * Wellpass, MVV ticket
 * Virtual shares for all permanent employees (VSOP=Virtual Share Option Program)
 * Company pension scheme (bAV) in cooperation with Allianz
 * Company accident insurance for all employees (insurance for accidents during work and leisure time around the world 24/7)
 * Discount on lunch meals
 * On top, enjoy a regular, fully-funded 5-day retreat to a Bavarian castle, devoted to pursuing your passion projects
 * A responsible position with individual autonomy, design freedom and competitive salary
 * Company events and get-togethers (Christmas, Summer party, Oktoberfest, etc)

 * Competitive salary

WE OFFER

At OroraTech, you can expect a down to earth yet high-caliber work environment. You will be part of the OroraTech team - a talented, international, open-minded team that is highly motivated to create impact. OroraTech allows you to grow on a professional and personal level. Benefits include:

 * Be part of the solution to climate change

 * Ambitious and entrepreneurial company culture with very high standards

 * Insights into the most exciting new technologies and business models

 * Individual career track development plans

 * A great remote/hybrid office culture, which allows you to be very flexible. Take care of your family? Late sleeper? Early riser? Prefer to work from outside from time to time? We can make all that work.

If you apply: Please always include references of your prior work (for example, your thesis, talks, papers, code repositories, websites, write-ups, articles, apps, exposes, anything), if permissible. Please avoid detailed grade reports and online certificates. We value well-crafted motivation letters stating how you learned about OroraTech, why you think you would be a great addition to the team and why you want to work at a NewSpace start-up. Please also list your earliest starting date and expected salary.

Apply for this job

job.description:
The Mission
We are looking for talented Software Engineers with demonstrated real-world experience to help us conceptualize, implement and operationalize mission-critical software components at the heart of our satellite constellation. As a key member of our team, you'll play an essential role in the ongoing operation and enhancement of our space-based sensor network - directly contributing to refine our ability to monitor and respond to wildfires, helping to safeguard communities, preserve wildlife, and protect ecosystems worldwide.
What you’ll be doing

For our cross-functional software development teams, we're looking for someone who’s proactive, with a strong ability to understand the bigger picture while also diving deep into technical details & implementations.

  • Modeling & Architecture: Proficient in complex systems architecture and skilled in breaking down given problems into manageable parts. Demonstrate discernment in making engineering trade-offs and systematically resolving requirements.

  • Development & Operations: Develop production-quality code in Python or GoLang, deploying to Linux-based infrastructure. You'll have hands-on involvement with databases, APIs, and networking.

  • Code Management & CI: Establish and participate in code reviews, and adhere to established Git workflows to ensure high-quality software development. Establish and maintain automated end-to-end testing frameworks for your software components, and be responsible for CI pipelines ensuring software robustness and reliability.
Relevant Skills
  • Shown practical experience
  • Knowledge and application of modeling approach
  • Advanced programming skills (Python, Golang or ES6) and Git, Docker, Databases, Linux, Software Packaging
  • University degree in Computer Science, STEM/MINT, or equivalent
  • Strong problem solving capabilities
  • Familiarity with general software engineering principles and agile software development (think: “develop a concept, pitch it to your peers, implement a prototype, accompany the implementation, deploy to production, evaluate results, repeat”)
  • Fluent in English
Our Benefits
  • Wellpass, MVV ticket
  • Virtual shares for all permanent employees (VSOP=Virtual Share Option Program)
  • Company pension scheme (bAV) in cooperation with Allianz
  • Company accident insurance for all employees (insurance for accidents during work and leisure time around the world 24/7)
  • Discount on lunch meals
  • On top, enjoy a regular, fully-funded 5-day retreat to a Bavarian castle, devoted to pursuing your passion projects
  • A responsible position with individual autonomy, design freedom and competitive salary
  • Company events and get-togethers (Christmas, Summer party, Oktoberfest, etc)

  • Competitive salary

We Offer
At OroraTech, you can expect a down to earth yet high-caliber work environment. You will be part of the OroraTech team - a talented, international, open-minded team that is highly motivated to create impact. OroraTech allows you to grow on a professional and personal level. Benefits include:

  • Be part of the solution to climate change

  • Ambitious and entrepreneurial company culture with very high standards

  • Insights into the most exciting new technologies and business models

  • Individual career track development plans

  • A great remote/hybrid office culture, which allows you to be very flexible. Take care of your family? Late sleeper? Early riser? Prefer to work from outside from time to time? We can make all that work.

If you apply: Please always include references of your prior work (for example, your thesis, talks, papers, code repositories, websites, write-ups, articles, apps, exposes, anything), if permissible. Please avoid detailed grade reports and online certificates. We value well-crafted motivation letters stating how you learned about OroraTech, why you think you would be a great addition to the team and why you want to work at a NewSpace start-up. Please also list your earliest starting date and expected salary.

Apply for this job
